== What are the New User Mentors ==
"New User Mentors" are people who dedicate at least 10 hours per week to helping new Ubuntu users. This is done via IRC, the mailing list, and via the forums.

These people are here to help YOU, the New Ubuntu User

== Who Are They? ==

To join this group, read NewUserNetworkGuidelines, item number 10 and when confirmed, come back here and add yourself to this wiki page.

You will also need to sign a copy of the code of conduct to join the launchpad group! More info about gpg, keysigning and signing data can be found in the GnuPrivacyGuardHowto.
